name: Shooting Shadows
description:
A little game about guns, ghosts, and trying again. Try to survive while ghosts try to invade your personal space. Collect the ghosts’ souls to advance to the next level, but watch out! The more souls you have, the harder the ghosts become!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WASD to move

Left mouse to shoot 

Enter to select/restart

E to interact with chests

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'd appreciate if you left a comment with what you thought about it. Have fun!
